reviewtext: B/c Monster pricing (discounting) has come down quite a bit over the years, I usually buy Monster surge protectors/filters for all of my televisions.  So far so good, although I haven't had one actually have to be used during a surge scenario.  I like the flat plug, on/off/protected/ground indicators, colored/spaced outlets, and even included coax cable.
summary: Great surge protector/filter for the money
